title: Plan for Required Minimum Distribution (RMD) Taxes
description: A retiree needs to take their first RMD from their traditional IRA and wants to plan for the income tax.

tasks.description: Calculate the RMD amount based on the prior year-end IRA balance and the retiree's age.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the required withdrawal amount.

tasks.description: Estimate the retiree's total income for the year, including the RMD.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent projects the retiree's annual income.

tasks.description: Advise the client on having federal income tax withheld from the RMD to cover the tax liability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends a specific percentage or dollar amount to withhold.
